description: White snow with subtle variations and light blue tinting

light_blue_tint.note: Very light blue tint for noise >= 14

generation_algorithm.step1: Calculate local pixel coordinates: pixelX_snow = globalX % 16, pixelY_snow = globalY % 16
generation_algorithm.step2: Generate pseudo-random noise: noiseVal_snow = (pixelX_snow * 13 + pixelY_snow * 29 + tileX * 11 + tileY * 17) % 21
generation_algorithm.step3: Select color based on noise threshold: < 7 = pure white, 7-13 = off-white, >= 14 = light blue tint

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded snow texture algorithm
metadata.pattern_type: Pattern 2 - Discrete color selection with pseudo-random noise

conversion_notes.algorithm_complexity: Simple discrete selection with three snow color variants
unique_features: Pseudo-random noise using pixel coordinates and tile position
Three-tier color system: pure white, off-white, light blue tint
Subtle color variations for realistic snow appearance
Tile-aware noise generation including tileX and tileY multipliers
conversion_notes.validation_required: Generated texture must match snow blocks with proper white/blue color distribution
